function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Non-compliance with closure rules and mobility restrictions","Impact":"Increased risk of crowding and contagion in parks","Mitigation":"Enforcement of rules, public awareness campaigns, and strict monitoring of park access","Technologies":"Surveillance technology for monitoring, public communication platforms for awareness campaigns","People":"Park visitors, park managers, and local authorities","Owner":"Park management, local authorities, and government agencies"}]}
